analysis.description:
Raven.startDate (/unique_contracts/0x4cee97ddd88f0bec86dd4b4163ca499a9790c3df.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_contracts/0x4cee97ddd88f0bec86dd4b4163ca499a9790c3df.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x4cee97ddd88f0bec86dd4b4163ca499a9790c3df.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x4cee97ddd88f0bec86dd4b4163ca499a9790c3df.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x4cee97ddd88f0bec86dd4b4163ca499a9790c3df.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
